description.title: Letterboxd 500 most watched movies of all time
subtitle: As of: January 11th, 2026
Seen: 57%
Hope you all enjoy and let me know if a movie is missing :)
* Barbie is #1 with 6,6M views
* Grown Ups is #500 with 1,287M views
Monthly changes:
* Wake Up Dead Man (#395), The Holiday (#450), Enola Holmes (#491) and Dirty Dancing (#496) are new on this list. Borat, Booksmart, Portrait of a Lady on Fire and The French Dispatch are out

* Frankenstein (+107), One Battle After Another (+86), F1 (+42), How the Grinch Stole Christmas (+39), Love Actually (+35), Home Alone 2 (+33), Five Nights at Freddy's (+33), The Holdovers (+31), The Fantastic Four: First Steps (+22), Avatar: The Way of Water (+19), KPop Demon Hunters (+19) gained the most spots.

* The Cabin in the Woods (-15), Kick-Ass (-15), The Big Lebowski (-13), American Beauty (-13), Anatomy of a Fall (-13), Asteroid City (-13), Her (-12), Marriage Story (-12), Birdman (-12) and Annihilation (-12) lost the most spots.
Movies that are close to an entrance:
* Borat (1,286M views)
* Scary Movie (1,283M views)
* Annihilation (1,282M views)
* Materialists (1,281M views)
* Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1,280M views)
Trending movies that will sooner or later be in this list:
* Wicked: For Good (1,196M views)
* Bugonia (1,150M views)
* Avatar: Fire and Ash (1,049M views)
* Zootopia 2 (955K views)
* Marty Supreme (873K views)
